Description: Lip and wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) pottery bowl-shaped cup; brown clay with white inclusions; interior glazed brown with added red band lined in white; exterior: reserved lip zone with narrow band below; inscription cut on exterior, in reserved zone.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 321)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 670, no. 282)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.371)
